Text: Doug Pray:  His work includes "Surfwise" (2008) a portrait of the nomadic, 11-member Doc Paskowitz family (often referred to as the "first family of surfing"); "Big Rig" (2008), a documentary about truck drivers; "Infamy" (2005), a documentary about graffiti culture; "Red Diaper Baby" (2004) a solo-performance film starring Josh Kornbluth; "Scratch" (2001), a documentary about turntablism and DJ culture; and his first feature, "Hype!
